answers.answer: I get that too and everybody thinks I'm just so young
People have always told me I look older than my age, I just don't know why people like to stare so much :(
Girl u aint seen or felt nothin yet im 37 weeks n i work all day long on my feet now thats pain!
I have PGP so I'm in constant pain :(
I've been uncomfortable too & it's making me nervous because i still have 12 weeks to go~ and thats when the baby grows the most!! We just gotta hang in there*
What's PGP??
I have 8 weeks and I feel so depressed. But I hate even ppl stare at pregnant women and they women y we have attitudes
I feel u
Pmaried-pelvic girdle pain and preeclampsia. I've been swelling bad everytime I walk.
Ouch.. i had preeclampsia with my 1st pregnancy.. if you get too swollen the doctor might recommend a full/partial bed rest..
I feel like tht sometimes bt I have a question ladies if u were to have preeclampsia when does the Dr detect it??
I feel like tht sometimes bt I have a question ladies if u were to have preeclampsia when does the Dr detect it??
Least you're showing :-(

I am soo scared for when I start to get real big, I have bad curvature in my spine due to my pelvic bone/hips being "off" so I already have bad hip and lower back pain...I'm scared ... I'm sorry you are so Uncomfy tho, no fun! I'm not sure why people stare Either..annoying! Lol
I feel like im getting preeclampsia :( im only 17weeks and huge also.  My dr said I can only eat low fat and my blood pressure high I never been so big

Drink lots of water and keep your legs elavated it will help with the preclapsia ive only had it once and it sucked!! Even when I would take my socks off I would have dents all around my ankles :/ if it gets to bad your doc might induce u early so be careful.
they're already planning too around 36 weeks if my BP continues the way it's going now.

my brothers friend told me wenever my feet start to swell soak them in pretty hot water....idk if im dumb or something but i cnt really tell if my feet are swelling or not haha i juss stare at them nd try to figure it out... cuz usually yu could see the veins in my feet popping out but sometimes yu cnt see them very well.. nd wen i take off my socks they have the dents around my ankles.. nd some people say if yu press down nd yu see like a finger mark then that means theyre swollen... but im juss dumb nd never really no haha

yeah, you press down for 5 seconds with your finger, and then release. If an indention stays on your foot for more than 5 seconds, then they're swollen. If the indention stays there for quite a bit, then they're really swollen.

im ganna try that....i know my fingers are swelling... i wear 2 rings nd both were a lil loose nd thursday they started irritating me nd i tried takin them off nd they wouldnt come off :/ nd i had an indent from them on my fingers fur a long time after i finally got them off... i still havent put them back on haha

question: I don't know if my baby went through a major growth spurt in the past few days, or just my belly, but anywho...I'M HUGE! I'm so freaking uncomfortable right now that I literally am about to cry. Not to mention that my mom drives this huge redneck truck that is made for mudding, so everytime I have to get in and out it takes me 5 minutes. Oh, and I was walking through walmart and getting such horrible stares from people, like they've never seen a pregnant woman before. I mean, good Lord, I know I'm wobbling like a duck and look like a bowling pin, but no need to freaking point it out. And my feet are so sore and swollen, and I'm hungry :( ugh. vent over.
title: venting!
